trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Quinn gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Quinn imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of him whose target isn’t Quinn. Quinn must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. If he does so, he can’t use this feature again until he finishes a short or long rest.

reaction.text: Quinn imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of him whose target isn’t Quinn. Quinn must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.text: Quinn can attack three times, instead of once, whenever he takes the attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. If he does so, he can’t use this feature again until he finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Quinn gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Quinn’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
trait.text: Quinn can reroll a saving throw that he fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Quinn has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Quinn can attack three times, instead of once, whenever he takes the attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. If he does so, he can’t use this feature again until he finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Quinn imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of him whose target isn’t Quinn. Quinn must be able to see the attacker.

trait.text: Quinn can attack three times, instead of once, whenever he takes the attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. he can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Quinn gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

trait.name: Unstoppable Force
trait.text: If Quinn's total for a strength check is less than Quinn's strength score, the score can be used in place of the total.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Quinn’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
trait.text: Quinn can reroll a saving throw that he fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Quinn has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Quinn can attack three times, instead of once, whenever he takes the attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. he can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Quinn imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of him whose target isn’t Quinn. Quinn must be able to see the attacker.

trait.text: If Quinn's total for a strength check is less than Quinn's strength score, the score can be used in place of the total.
